results.title: Perioperative Statin Use May Reduce Postoperative Arrhythmia Rates After Total Joint Arthroplasty.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Treating as few as 28 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with perioperative @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ prevents one new @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@cardiac arrhythmia@@@ within 90 days in statin-naive @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ undergoing TJA.

citations.NLM: Bonano JC, Aratani AK, Sambare TD, Goodman SB, Huddleston JI 3rd, Maloney WJ, Burk DR, Aaronson AJ, Finlay AK, Amanatullah DF. Perioperative Statin Use May Reduce Postoperative Arrhythmia Rates After Total Joint Arthroplasty. J Arthroplasty. 2021 Oct;36(10):3401-3405. PMID: 34127349
citations.BibTeX: @article{34127349, title={Perioperative Statin Use May Reduce Postoperative Arrhythmia Rates After Total Joint Arthroplasty.}, author={Bonano JC and Aratani AK and Sambare TD and Goodman SB and Huddleston JI 3rd and Maloney WJ and Burk DR and Aaronson AJ and Finlay AK and Amanatullah DF}, journal={J Arthroplasty}, volume={36}, number={10}, pages={3401-3405}}

results.title: Simvastatin Modulates Remodeling of Kv4.3 Expression in Rat Hypertrophied Cardiomyocytes
results.text_hl: It can be speculated that among the pleiotropic effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, the anti-@<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmia@@@ effect is partly mediated by its effect on @GENE_KCND3 @GENE_65195 @@@Kv4.3@@@.

citations.NLM: Su F, Shi M, Yan Z, Ou D, Li J, Lu Z, Zheng Q. Simvastatin Modulates Remodeling of Kv4.3 Expression in Rat Hypertrophied Cardiomyocytes Int J Biol Sci. 2012;8(2):236-48. PMID: 22253567
citations.BibTeX: @article{22253567, title={Simvastatin Modulates Remodeling of Kv4.3 Expression in Rat Hypertrophied Cardiomyocytes}, author={Su F and Shi M and Yan Z and Ou D and Li J and Lu Z and Zheng Q}, journal={Int J Biol Sci}, volume={8}, number={2}, pages={236-48}}

results.title: The effect of acute simvastatin administration on the severity of arrhythmias resulting from ischaemia and reperfusion in the canine: Is there a role for nitric oxide?
results.text_hl: We conclude that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ given just prior to @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@/reperfusion reduces the severity of @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmias@@@.

citations.NLM: Kisvári G, Kovács M, Gardi J, Seprényi G, Kaszaki J, Végh Á. The effect of acute simvastatin administration on the severity of arrhythmias resulting from ischaemia and reperfusion in the canine: Is there a role for nitric oxide? Eur J Pharmacol. 2014 Jun 5;732():96-104. PMID: 24685640

results.title: The activation of PI 3-kinase/Akt pathway is involved in the acute effects of simvastatin against ischaemia and reperfusion-induced arrhythmias in anaesthetised dogs.
results.text_hl: The activation of PI 3-kinase/Akt pathway is involved in the acute effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ against @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@ and reperfusion-induced @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmias@@@ in anaesthetised @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@.

citations.NLM: Kisvári G, Kovács M, Seprényi G, Végh Á. The activation of PI 3-kinase/Akt pathway is involved in the acute effects of simvastatin against ischaemia and reperfusion-induced arrhythmias in anaesthetised dogs. Eur J Pharmacol. 2015 Dec 15;769():185-94. PMID: 26597117

results.title: Simvastatin treatment attenuates increased respiratory variability and apnea/hypopnea index in rats with chronic heart failure.
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@statin@@@ treatment would ameliorate enhanced CBC sensitivity as well as increased respiratory variability, @DISEASE_Sleep_Apnea_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D020181 @@@apnea/hypopnea@@@ index, and @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmia@@@ index, in a rodent model of @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@.

citations.NLM: Haack KK, Marcus NJ, Del Rio R, Zucker IH, Schultz HD. Simvastatin treatment attenuates increased respiratory variability and apnea/hypopnea index in rats with chronic heart failure. Hypertension. 2014 May;63(5):1041-9. PMID: 24516105

results.title: The effects of simvastatin preconditioning on the expression of caspase-3 after myocardial ischemia reperfusion injury in rats
results.text_hl: The @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmia@@@ score of the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group was significantly lower than that of the @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@-reperfusion group (P<0.05).

citations.NLM: Sun W, Pan R, Song J, Sun H. The effects of simvastatin preconditioning on the expression of caspase-3 after myocardial ischemia reperfusion injury in rats Exp Ther Med. 2019 Mar;17(3):2230-2234. PMID: 30783483
citations.BibTeX: @article{30783483, title={The effects of simvastatin preconditioning on the expression of caspase-3 after myocardial ischemia reperfusion injury in rats}, author={Sun W and Pan R and Song J and Sun H}, journal={Exp Ther Med}, volume={17}, number={3}, pages={2230-2234}}

results.title: Pleiotropic Effects of Simvastatin on Some Calcium Regulatory and Myofibrillar Proteins in Ischemic/Reperfused Heart: Causality of Statins Cardioprotection?
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment did not modify the plasma @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ levels; however, it recovered depressed cardiac performance and reduced @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@reperfusion arrhythmias@@@ without affecting the activation of CaMKIIdelta through phosphorylation of Thr287.

citations.NLM: Szobi A, Lichy M, Carnicka S, Pancza D, Svec P, Ravingerova T, Adameova A. Pleiotropic Effects of Simvastatin on Some Calcium Regulatory and Myofibrillar Proteins in Ischemic/Reperfused Heart: Causality of Statins Cardioprotection? Curr Pharm Des. 2016;22(42):6451-6458. PMID: 27526788
citations.BibTeX: @article{27526788, title={Pleiotropic Effects of Simvastatin on Some Calcium Regulatory and Myofibrillar Proteins in Ischemic/Reperfused Heart: Causality of Statins Cardioprotection?}, author={Szobi A and Lichy M and Carnicka S and Pancza D and Svec P and Ravingerova T and Adameova A}, journal={Curr Pharm Des}, volume={22}, number={42}, pages={6451-6458}}

results.title: Changes in PPAR gene expression and myocardial tolerance to ischaemia: relevance to pleiotropic effects of statins.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@-treated hearts exhibited smaller size of @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarction@@@ (11.5% +/- 0.4% vs. 33.7% +/- 4% in controls; p < 0.01), improved postischaemic contractile recovery, and lower severity of @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmias@@@ during @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@ and early reperfusion.

citations.NLM: Ravingerová T, Adameová A, Kelly T, Antonopoulou E, Pancza D, Ondrejcáková M, Khandelwal VK, Carnická S, Lazou A. Changes in PPAR gene expression and myocardial tolerance to ischaemia: relevance to pleiotropic effects of statins. Can J Physiol Pharmacol. 2009 Dec;87(12):1028-36. PMID: 20029539

results.title: Simvastatin activates single skeletal RyR1 channels but exerts more complex regulation of the cardiac RyR2 isoform
results.text_hl: The ability of low concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to reduce @GENE_100294532 @GENE_100294532 @@@RyR2@@@ Po may also protect against Ca2+-dependent @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmias@@@ and @DISEASE_Death_Sudden_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D016757 @@@sudden cardiac death@@@.
